    • Method Detail

      • addStorage

        EventStorage addStorage(Context context,
                        EventDefinition def)
        Add a dedicated event storage for events of a certain type.
        Parameters:
        context - Context those events should be kept in the storage or null if the storage is valid for all contexts
        def - Type of events to keep in the storage
        Returns:
        Newly created storage descriptor

      • getStorage

        EventStorage getStorage(java.lang.String context,
                        java.lang.String event)
        Get event storage to used to keep certain events.
        Parameters:
        context - Path of context to find the storage for
        event - Name of event to find the storage for
        Returns:
        Event storage descriptor

      • getFactory

        DaoFactory getFactory()
        Returns storage manager's DAO factory
        Returns:
        The DAO factory being used

      • getDefaultStorage

        EventStorage getDefaultStorage()
        Get an event storage used to keep events that are not forwarded to any other custom storage.
        Returns:
        Default event storage descriptor

      • getStorages

        java.util.Collection<EventStorage> getStorages()
        Returns a list of all event storages available on the server.
        Returns:
        List of event storages

      • getStoragesAsTable

        DataTable getStoragesAsTable()
                      throws DataTableException
        Returns a list of all event storages in form of a DataTable.
        Returns:
        DataTable containing all event storages
        Throws:
        DataTableException - If conversion to a DataTable has failed

      • getStorage

        EventStorage getStorage(java.lang.String table)
        Returns an event storage descriptor by a specified table name.
        Parameters:
        table - Name of storage table
        Returns:
        Event storage descriptor

      • addStorage

        void addStorage(EventStorage storage)
        Add a new storage.
        Parameters:
        storage - A storage to add

      • removeStorage

        void removeStorage(EventStorage storage)
        Remove a storage
        Parameters:
        storage - A storage to remove.

      • removeStorages

        void removeStorages(java.lang.String context)
             throws DaoException,
                    ContextException
        Remove all storages associated with a context.
        Parameters:
        context - The context those storages should be removed
        Throws:
        DaoException - If a removal has failed
        ContextException - If any other error occurred

      • updateStorages

        void updateStorages(DataTable oldStoragesTable,
                    DataTable newStoragesTable,
                    boolean create)
             throws DaoException
        Update event storages
        Parameters:
        oldStoragesTable - Old storages table
        newStoragesTable - New storages table
        create - True if any newly added storage should be created
        Throws:
        DaoException - If updating has failed

      • initializeEventStorages

        void initializeEventStorages(java.util.List<? extends EventStorage> eventStorages,
                             boolean create)
                      throws DaoException
        Perform initialization of all storages. This normally happens during DAO system startup.
        Parameters:
        eventStorages - A list of storages to initialize
        create - Defines whether storages should be created
        Throws:
        DaoException - If initialization has failed

      • fetchEventStorages

        java.util.List<? extends EventStorage> fetchEventStorages()
                                                   throws DaoException
        Returns a list of all event storages available on the server.
        Returns:
        List of event storages
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • fetchEventStoragesTable

        DataTable fetchEventStoragesTable()
                           throws DaoException,
                                  ContextException
        Returns a list of all event storages in form of a DataTable.
        Returns:
        DataTable containing all event storages
        Throws:
        DataTableException - If conversion to a DataTable has failed
        DaoException
        ContextException

      • prepareDedicatedStorage

        void prepareDedicatedStorage(Context context,
                             EventDefinition def,
                             boolean create)
                      throws DaoException,
                             ContextException
        Setup a dedicated event storage for specific events.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to configure the storage for or null if the storage should be valid for all contexts
        def - Event definition
        create - Defines whether the storage should be created
        Throws:
        DaoException - If storage creation has failed
        ContextException - If any other error occurred

      • getStorageByContext

        EventStorage getStorageByContext(java.lang.String context)
        Returns an event storage descriptor by a specified context name.
        Parameters:
        context - Name of storage context
        Returns:
        Event storage descriptor
